actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the entering into of bilateral arrangements with foreign countries to achieve fair and open international trade in steel products.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should, in addition to negotiating appropriate extensions of existing bilateral arrangements covering steel products, seek to negotiate bilateral arrangements with Thailand, Argentina, Indonesia, Sweden, Norway, Taiwan, and other steel-exporting countries that are not parties to such arrangements.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the entering into of bilateral arrangements with foreign countries to achieve fair and open international trade in steel products.
